item.title: Linux 时区设置
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000005026503 UTC时间与北京时间的关系 GMT + 8 = UTC + 8 = CST CST= UTC + 8 = GMT + 8 北京时间等于 UTC + 8 小时 CST:中国标准时间（China Standard Time) 等价于 UTC:世界标

item.title: Linux下给力截图工具归纳
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: Linux下给力截图工具归纳 - oZuiJiaoWeiYang的专栏 - 博客频道 - CSDN.NET Flameshot sudo apt install flameshot hotshots sudo apt-add-repository ppa:dhor/myway sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install hotshots 1、系统自带 gnome-screenshot 截取自定义区域
